conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall heights and cutaway treatment.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness; viewing angle is ideal for a cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout reproduction. All major walls, room adjacencies, and the staircase are correctly positioned. Minor simplification in door swing representation.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan perfectly, including kitchen island, bedroom layout, and living area set.

visual_clarity.notes: Structural clarity is high, but score is penalized due to the retention of 2D text labels (Kitchen/Living, Bedroom) in the 3D render.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D source are baked into the 3D floor plane.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains near-perfect geometric and asset alignment with the original 2D architectural drawing.
